The GIFIORE Oval Sunglasses offer a stylish 90s retro vibe with a trendy gold frame and grey lenses that provide both fashion and function. Whether you’re heading to the beach or strolling around town, these sunglasses are designed to make a statement. The lightweight frame ensures comfort while the oval shape adds a distinct touch to any outfit. They’re a versatile accessory for anyone looking to elevate their eyewear collection.  Pros: 1. Trendy Design: The vintage oval shape and gold frame give off a chic retro look. 2. Comfortable Fit: Lightweight frame ensures easy, all-day wear. 3. UV Protection: Grey lenses offer protection from the sun. 4. Unisex Appeal: The design works well for both men and women.  Cons: 1. Limited Lens Color: Only available with grey lenses, limiting styling options. 2. Size Fit: May not be ideal for those with smaller faces, as the frame can appear oversized. 3. Frame Durability: The gold frame might be more prone to scratches and wear over time.  GIFIORE Oval Sunglasses are perfect for those seeking a fashionable, comfortable pair of sunglasses, though they may not be the best fit for everyone due to the frame size and lens color limitations.

So, instead, I ordered a pink mirrored and silver mirrored to try because in the photos, when they show them from the back, it doesn't have that same reddish look, so hopefully those colors will work better!  UPDATE:  The pink mirrored have a dark blue tint that again was just too weird, so I returned those, but the silver mirrored don't really have a tint, so they are phenomenal!
